name: Diced Skull
description:
Face your choices

Manage risk and reward by assigning positive and negative effects to the faces of your face (dice). Negative effects will give a boost to your abilities, but you'll need to survive the bullet hell you're creating for yourself...

You need at least 1 negative ability on your dice for it to be legal. After certain amounts of kills you will unlock new abilities and new negative effects.

Game Jam comment

Time management did NOT go well. 2 floors are available in the demo, should've been 3 but I warped the stairs to the wrong floor. Build done past deadline with some of the following glitches fixed (not for game jam evaluation I think).

Known bugs
  • Level 3 unreachable
  • You take damages from Swords/Scissors (broken)
  • It's possible to make a dice without any attacks (positive ability)
Controls

Use a gamepad.

  • Left stick : move
  • Right stick: aim
  • Right analog: roll the dice
  • D-pad : navigate menus
  • Circle: confirm menus
  • Cross: cancel menus
